document_data.mainbody:
he luminous being was a mysterious entity that existed beyond the normal cosmology, at the beginning and the end of time simultaneously, yet outside time and space proper.
The luminous being was a cold and harsh entity, yet at the same time forgiving and warm.
Little was known about the luminous being. It was in charge of the creation and destruction of all the universes, Yet, around 1479 DR, it was claimed that Lord Ao served no one.
